snippet: The shocking nature of the accident, and its grim consequences, underscored problems posed by Russia’s Soviet-era infrastructure.
abstract: Woman pushing her child in a baby stroller falls into sinkhole in a provincial Russian city when a section of sidewalk suddenly opens into a crater; woman survives but fate of her child remains unknown, after boy is swept away into city's subterranean piping; shocking accident underscores problems posed by Russia's Soviet-era infrastructure.
lead_paragraph: The shocking nature of the accident, and its grim consequences, underscored problems posed by Russia’s Soviet-era infrastructure.

headline.seo: Russian Child Disappears Into Pipe After Falling Into Sinkhole
headline.main: Russian Child Disappears Into Pipe After Falling Into a Sinkhole
headline.print_headline: Russian Child Disappears Into Pipe After Falling Into a Sinkhole With His Mother
